mapper.select: SELECT sc.id AS sc_id, sc.student_id AS sc_student_id, sc.course_name AS sc_course_name, sc.course_start AS sc_course_start, sc.course_end AS sc_course_end, cs.id AS cs_id, cs.student_course_id AS cs_student_course_id, cs.status AS cs_status FROM students_courses sc LEFT JOIN course_status cs ON sc.id = cs.student_course_id

SELECT sc.id AS sc_id, sc.student_id AS sc_student_id, sc.course_name AS sc_course_name, sc.course_start AS sc_course_start, sc.course_end AS sc_course_end, cs.id AS cs_id, cs.student_course_id AS cs_student_course_id, cs.status AS cs_status FROM students_courses sc LEFT JOIN course_status cs ON sc.id = cs.student_course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students ( name, kana_name, nick_name, email, area, age, gender, remark, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false )
INSERT INTO course_status ( student_course_id, status ) VALUES ( #{studentCourseId}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, kana_name = #{kanaName}, nick_name = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, area = #{area}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE students_courses SET course_name=#{courseName} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE course_status SET status=#{status} WHERE id = #{id}
